document_data.name: Manawabe
document_data.mainbody: '''Manawabe''' was a [[human]] [[druid]] who lived in the jungles of [[Chult]].
document_data.Description: A muscular, tanned man, Manawabe had reddish-brown hair and facial hair. He wore a loincloth made from animal skin, and his arms were tattooed with images of plants.
document_data.Abilities: He was unusually dextrous, making him a difficult target to hit in combat.
document_data.Possessions: Manawabe owned two [[magic]]al weapons: a ''[[spear|spear +2]]'', and a ''[[dagger|dagger +4]]''.
document_data.Activities: Having vast experience dealing with the fauna and flora native to Chult, Manawabe made for an excellent jungle guide. However, he would not aid anyone seeking to harm the jungle.
